quote: Where his boyhood retreat had been a cave hewn for one, it now accommodated two. He was suddenly two and it amazed and delighted, causing a stir in the pit of him, a kind of fibrillation.
quote_letters: WHERE HIS BOYHOOD RETREAT HAD BEEN A CAVE HEWN FOR ONE IT NOW ACCOMMODATED TWO HE WAS SUDDENLY TWO AND IT AMAZED AND DELIGHTED CAUSING A STIR IN THE PIT OF HIM A KIND OF FIBRILLATION
